snippet.title: Lumiterra Game Trailer
snippet.description:
🔥 The demo is out now! Give it a try on Itch today and have a blast! 🔥

Lumiterra is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can ⚔️battle, 👩‍🌾farm with your friends🧑‍🤝‍🧑 or mysterious collected creatures in a vast world🗺️!

🌟 Key Features 🌟 
Multiplayer: Play alone or in with your friends.
Battle: Fight monsters with various weapons and skills in a vast world.
Farming: Grow crops, catch and feed monsters in your farm.
Collecting: Collect grass, wood, rock in different area of the world.
Crafting: Use different materials from battle, farming or collecting to craft weapons, equipments, totem, potion, etc.

‎ ‏‎‎🍄 🌳 🐌 Lumiterra Official Links  🌺 🐇 🌿
🐤 Twitter ►  https://twitter.com/LumiterraGame
💻 Website ►  https://lumiterra.net/
